Package se.sics.prologbeans

PrologBeans is a package for integrating Prolog with applications in other languages.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bindings
    Bindings handles the variable bindings in the communication with the prolog server.
    PBTerm
    PBTerm is the representations of Prolog terms.
    PrologSession
    PrologSession handles the connection with the Prolog Server.
    QueryAnswer
    QueryAnswer is the representation of an answer from the Prolog server.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalCharacterSetException
    A string contained unsupported characters

Package se.sics.prologbeans Description

PrologBeans is a package for integrating Prolog with applications in other languages. This is the documentation for the version of Prolognbeans. The main idea is to separate the two processes so that they can be run on more than one machine. The of the interface consists of the package `se.sics.prologbeans', and the Prolog part is the library module `library(prologbeans)'.

Related Documentation

For documentation on library(prologbeans), please see:
